metadata.title: CVE-2023-45871 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in drivers/net/ethernet/intel/igb/igb_main.c in theIGB driver in the Linux kernel before 6.5.3. A buffer size may not beadequate for frames larger than the MTU.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
